original_text: Then Moses took the anointing oil and anointed the tabernacle and all that was in it, and consecrated them.
korean_text: 모세가 관유를 가져다가 성막과 그 안에 있는 모든 것에 발라 거룩하게 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Moses took the anointing oil
and anointed the tabernacle and all that was in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성막과 그 안에 있는 모든 것에 발랐습니다
